thunderstormDescriptions: Why did the thunderstorm get invited to all the parties? Because it's a real 'flash'!
What did the lightning bolt say to the other lightning bolt? 'You're shocking!'
Why do thunderstorms never get invited to play hide and seek? Because they always 'thunder' where they are!
What's a thunderstorm's favorite game? Lightning round!
Why did the storm go to school? To get a little thunder-standing!
What do you call a wet bear? A drizzly bear during a thunderstorm!
How does thunder ask for forgiveness? It says, 'I'm sorry, I'll try to keep it down!'
Why was the thundercloud so loud? It just couldn't keep its boom mouth shut!
What do you get if you cross a jogger and a thunderstorm? Run for your life!
Why did the thunderstorm break up with the high-pressure system? It needed some space to rumble!
